com.jdroid.android.social.facebook

Class MultipleUsersSharedPreferencesTokenCachingStrategy

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.facebook.TokenCachingStrategy
      • com.facebook.SharedPreferencesTokenCachingStrategy
        • com.jdroid.android.social.facebook.MultipleUsersSharedPreferencesTokenCachingStrategy

  • public class MultipleUsersSharedPreferencesTokenCachingStrategy
extends SharedPreferencesTokenCachingStrategy
    An implementation of TokenCachingStrategy that uses Android SharedPreferences to persist information, using the user id from the SecurityContext as key in the SharedPreferences. This enables the possibility to cache multiple users' tokens.

    • Field Summary

      • Fields inherited from class com.facebook.TokenCachingStrategy
